metadata.title: CVE-2020-15396 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In HylaFAX+ through 7.0.2 and HylaFAX Enterprise, the faxsetup utility calls chown on files in user-owned directories. By winning a race, a local attacker could use this to escalate his privileges to root.

criterions.comment: hylafax package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
